name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,354 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 864,973 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.

Valid only for tank specializations.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,204 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 131 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.
